member.summary: Feature coordinator instance.

member.summary: Runner factory.

member.summary: Returns true if already disposed, otherwise false.

member.name: M:LightBDD.Core.Execution.Coordination.FeatureCoordinator.Install(LightBDD.Core.Execution.Coordination.FeatureCoordinator)
member.summary: Installs the specified feature coordinator in thread safe manner.
member.exception: Exception thrown if another coordinator is already installed.

member.name: M:LightBDD.Core.Execution.Coordination.FeatureCoordinator.#ctor(LightBDD.Core.Extensibility.FeatureRunnerRepository,LightBDD.Core.Execution.Coordination.IFeatureAggregator)
member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: Runner factory instance that would be used for instantiating runners.
Feature aggregator instance used for aggregating feature results on coordinator disposal.

member.name: M:LightBDD.Core.Execution.Coordination.FeatureCoordinator.Dispose
member.summary:
Disposes coordinator, triggering feature result aggregation. Each runner belonging to , is disposed and its feature result is aggregated. After aggregation of all results, the feature aggregator is disposed as well.
If coordinator is already disposed, methods does nothing.

member.summary: Feature aggregator interface for collecting feature results.

member.summary: Aggregates given feature result.

member.param: object used in providing step metadata.
object used in providing step parameter formatters.

member.name: P:LightBDD.Core.Extensibility.CoreMetadataProvider.CultureInfoProvider
member.summary: Returns currently used instance.

member.summary: Returns currently used instance.

member.name: M:LightBDD.Core.Extensibility.CoreMetadataProvider.GetFeatureInfo(System.Type)
member.summary:
Provides object containing information about feature represented by .
The is determined from the name. The are determined from attributes implementing , applied on . The is determined from attribute implementing in first instance, then by () method. The value may be null.

member.name: M:LightBDD.Core.Extensibility.CoreMetadataProvider.CaptureCurrentScenarioMethod
member.summary: Provides currently executed scenario method.
member.exception: Thrown when called outside of scenario method.

member.name: M:LightBDD.Core.Extensibility.CoreMetadataProvider.GetScenarioName(System.Reflection.MethodBase)
member.summary: Provides object containing information about scenario name represented by . The name is based on provided method name. The current implementation ignores scenario parameters, always constructing object with empty collection.

member.name: M:LightBDD.Core.Extensibility.CoreMetadataProvider.GetScenarioLabels(System.Reflection.MethodBase)
member.summary: Provides scenario labels for scenario represented by which are determined from attributes implementing , applied on the method.

member.name: M:LightBDD.Core.Extensibility.CoreMetadataProvider.GetScenarioCategories(System.Reflection.MethodBase)
member.summary:
Provides scenario categories for scenario represented by . The categories are determined from attributes implementing , applied on and type declaring the method, as well as from () executed on and type declaring the method.
The categories specified on base classes will also be retrieved.

member.name: M:LightBDD.Core.Extensibility.CoreMetadataProvider.GetStepName(LightBDD.Core.Extensibility.StepDescriptor,System.String)
member.summary:
Provides object containing information about step name represented by . The represents the step type name of previous step.
The is determined from value or parsed from if former is null. When determined step type is the same as , it is being replaced with .
See also: , .
member.param: Step type name of previous step, or null if current step is first one.

member.name: M:LightBDD.Core.Extensibility.CoreMetadataProvider.GetStepParameterFormatter(System.Reflection.ParameterInfo)
member.summary: Provides step parameter formatter function for provided . If is applied on , it will be used to retrieve formatter function, otherwise the default one will be provided. The returned formatter function uses to format parameters.
member.param: object describing step or scenario method parameter.
member.exception: Throws when more than one is applied on .

member.name: M:LightBDD.Core.Extensibility.CoreMetadataProvider.GetImplementationSpecificScenarioCategories(System.Reflection.MemberInfo)
member.summary: Returns implementation specific scenario categories or empty collection if no categories are provided.
member.param: Scenario method or feature test class to analyze.

member.name: M:LightBDD.Core.Extensibility.CoreMetadataProvider.GetImplementationSpecificFeatureDescription(System.Type)
member.summary: Returns implementation specific feature description or null if such is not provided.

member.name: M:LightBDD.Core.Extensibility.CoreMetadataProvider.ExtractAttributePropertyValue``1(System.Reflection.MemberInfo,System.Func{``0,System.String})
member.summary: Provides value of attribute of type applied on or default if attribute is not applied. The attribute is searched in and it's ancestors.
member.param: Member to analyze for specified attribute.
member.exception: Throws when attribute is applied more than once.

member.name: M:LightBDD.Core.Extensibility.CoreMetadataProvider.ExtractAttributePropertyValues``1(System.Reflection.MemberInfo,System.Func{``0,System.String})
member.summary: Provides values of all attributes of type applied on or empty collection if none are applied. The attribute is searched in and it's ancestors.
member.param: Member to analyze for specified attribute.
member.returns: Values of all attributes or empty collection.

member.name: M:LightBDD.Core.Extensibility.CoreMetadataProvider.ExtractAttributes``1(System.Reflection.MemberInfo)
member.summary: Provides all attributes of type applied on or empty collection if none are applied. The attribute is searched in and it's ancestors.
member.param: Member to analyze for specified attribute.

member.name: M:LightBDD.Core.Extensibility.CoreMetadataProvider.GetFeatureLabels(System.Type)
member.summary: Provides labels from attributes implementing , applied on , or empty array if none are present.
member.returns: Array of labels or empty array if none are present.

member.name: M:LightBDD.Core.Extensibility.CoreMetadataProvider.GetFeatureName(System.Type)
member.summary: Provides feature name which is determined from name of .

member.name: M:LightBDD.Core.Extensibility.CoreMetadataProvider.GetFeatureDescription(System.Type)
member.summary: Provides feature description which is determined from attribute implementing in first instance, then by () method. Returns description or null if none is present.

member.summary: Returns CultureInfo that should be used for text formatting.

member.name: T:LightBDD.Core.Extensibility.IFeatureDescriptionAttribute
member.summary:
Feature description attribute interface that can be applied on feature test class. May be used to enrich feature class with description like "In order to... As a... I want to..." or similar, that would be used by progress notifier and would be included in summary.
If given implementation supports alternative description attributes, and both are applied on class, this one would be used.

member.name: P:LightBDD.Core.Extensibility.IFeatureDescriptionAttribute.Description
member.summary: Feature description.

member.name: T:LightBDD.Core.Extensibility.IFeatureFixtureRunner
member.summary: IFeatureFixtureRunner interface allowing to define and execute scenarios in programmatic manner. The interface is dedicated for projects extending LightBDD with user friendly API for running scenarios - it should not be used directly by regular LightBDD users.

member.name: M:LightBDD.Core.Extensibility.IFeatureFixtureRunner.NewScenario
member.summary: Creates new scenario to execute.

member.name: T:LightBDD.Core.Extensibility.IFeatureRunner
member.summary:
The feature runner interface allowing to execute feature tests and collect execution results. The instances of this interface can be provided by .
It is expected that for given feature test class, one instance of is created, while each class instance will have dedicated instance of .
Note for testing framework integration projects: The feature runner should be disposed after all scenarios execution.

member.name: M:LightBDD.Core.Extensibility.IFeatureRunner.ForFixture(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns instance allowing to execute scenario tests on object.
member.param: Fixture object containing scenario tests to execute.
member.exception: Throws when type does not match feature type that has been created for by .

member.name: M:LightBDD.Core.Extensibility.IFeatureRunner.GetFeatureResult
member.summary: Returns current results of feature tests.

member.name: T:LightBDD.Core.Extensibility.IScenarioCategoryAttribute
member.summary:
Scenario category attribute interface that can be applied on scenario test method. May be used to associate scenarios with specific categories. It is possible to apply multiple categories on given scenario.
If given implementation supports alternative category attributes, and both are applied on scenario method, all of them would be used.

member.summary: Scenario category name.

member.name: T:LightBDD.Core.Extensibility.IScenarioRunner
member.summary: IScenarioRunner interface allowing to programmatically construct scenario to execute. The interface is dedicated for projects extending LightBDD with user friendly API for running scenarios - it should not be used directly by regular LightBDD users.

member.summary: Configures steps to be executed with scenario.

member.name: M:LightBDD.Core.Extensibility.IScenarioRunner.WithCapturedScenarioDetails
member.summary: Configures scenario details with values inferred by .

member.name: M:LightBDD.Core.Extensibility.IScenarioRunner.WithLabels(System.String[])
member.summary: Configures scenario with labels.

member.name: M:LightBDD.Core.Extensibility.IScenarioRunner.WithCategories(System.String[])
member.summary: Configures scenario with categories.

member.name: M:LightBDD.Core.Extensibility.IScenarioRunner.WithName(System.String)
member.summary: Configures scenario with name.
member.exception: Throws when is null or empty.

member.name: M:LightBDD.Core.Extensibility.IScenarioRunner.WithContext(System.Func{System.Object})
member.summary: Configures scenario to be executed with context provided by .

member.name: M:LightBDD.Core.Extensibility.IScenarioRunner.RunAsynchronously
member.summary: Runs scenario asynchronously and returns task representing it. Before scenario is run, a validation is done if scenario is properly configured (i.e. name is defined and there is defined at least one step to execute).
member.exception: Throws when name or steps are not defined.

member.name: M:LightBDD.Core.Extensibility.IScenarioRunner.RunSynchronously
member.summary: Runs scenario synchronously - guaranteeing that scenario and all steps will execute on the same, calling thread. Before scenario is run, a validation is done if scenario is properly configured (i.e. name is defined and there is defined at least one step to execute). It is expected that only such scenarios can run synchronously whose steps returns completed . If any step method returns pending task, an exception will be thrown.
member.exception: Throws when name or steps are not defined before scenario run. Throws also if any step method returns pending task.

member.name: T:LightBDD.Core.Extensibility.ParameterDescriptor

member.param: Constant value that would be bound to the parameter.

member.summary: Creates object representing with not-constant value provided by . It is expected that would be used once to evaluate parameter value, just before execution of method requiring this parameter value.
member.param: Value evaluator function that should be used to retrieve parameter value.

member.summary: Returns parameter raw name.

member.name: P:LightBDD.Core.Extensibility.ParameterDescriptor.ValueEvaluator
member.summary: Returns parameter value evaluator that would be used to evaluate parameter value during execution. The value evaluator function parameter represents scenario context object defined by () method.

member.name: T:LightBDD.Core.Formatting.TimeFormatter
member.summary: Extension methods for formatting TimeSpan values.

member.name: M:LightBDD.Core.Formatting.TimeFormatter.FormatPretty(System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary:
Formats given value if provided or returns empty string.
This method returns up to 2 most meaningful time components of given time, to make it most readable. Maximal supported time component is 'day', while the minimal is 'millisecond'. TimeSpan value being less than 1ms but larger than 0 would be presented as <1ms.
Example values:
1d 12h
5h
5m 02s
2s 527ms
<1ms
0ms

member.name: M:LightBDD.Core.Formatting.TimeFormatter.FormatPretty(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary:
This method returns up to 2 most meaningful time components of given time, to make it most readable. Maximal supported time component is 'day', while the minimal is 'millisecond'. TimeSpan value being less than 1ms but larger than 0 would be presented as <1ms.
Example values:
1d 12h
5h
5m 02s
2s 527ms
<1ms
0ms

member.summary: Returns name format.

member.name: P:LightBDD.Core.Metadata.INameInfo.Parameters
member.summary: Returns name parameters used in formatting or empty collection if name is not parameterized.

member.summary: Interface describing name parameter metadata.

member.summary: Returns true if parameter is already evaluated or false if not.

member.name: P:LightBDD.Core.Metadata.INameParameterInfo.FormattedValue

member.summary: Returns scenario name.

member.summary: Returns scenario labels or empty collection if none specified.

member.name: P:LightBDD.Core.Metadata.IScenarioInfo.Categories
member.summary: Returns scenario categories or empty collection if none specified.

member.name: T:LightBDD.Core.Metadata.IStepInfo
member.summary: Interface describing scenario step metadata.

member.name: P:LightBDD.Core.Metadata.IStepInfo.Name
member.summary: Returns step name.

member.name: P:LightBDD.Core.Metadata.IStepInfo.Number
member.summary: Returns step number in all steps belonging to scenario.

member.name: P:LightBDD.Core.Metadata.IStepInfo.Total
member.summary: Returns total number of steps in scenario.

member.name: T:LightBDD.Core.Metadata.IStepNameInfo
member.summary: Interface describing step name metadata.

member.name: M:LightBDD.Core.Metadata.IStepNameInfo.Format(LightBDD.Core.Formatting.NameDecorators.IStepNameDecorator)
member.summary: Formats step name using provided decorator.

member.name: P:LightBDD.Core.Metadata.IStepNameInfo.StepTypeName
member.summary: Returns step type name (may be null).

member.name: T:LightBDD.Core.Metadata.IStepTypeNameInfo
member.summary: Interface describing step type name metadata.

member.name: M:LightBDD.Core.Metadata.IStepTypeNameInfo.ToString
member.summary: Returns value.

member.name: P:LightBDD.Core.Metadata.IStepTypeNameInfo.Name
member.summary: Returns normalized step type name. If consecutive steps are of the same type (like: GIVEN, GIVEN, GIVEN, WHEN, WHEN), the name of all except first one will be normalized with value of (producing steps like: GIVEN, AND, AND, WHEN, AND).

member.name: P:LightBDD.Core.Metadata.IStepTypeNameInfo.OriginalName
member.summary: Returns original step type name (before normalization).

member.summary: Class allowing to generate and save reports for executed features. It supports multiple instances that can be specified in constructor.

member.summary: Constructor configuring report generator with that would be used to write reports on generator disposal.

member.summary: Aggregates given feature result.

member.name: M:LightBDD.Core.Reporting.FeatureReportGenerator.Dispose
member.summary: Writes all aggregated results and disposes the object.

member.summary: Returns scenario details.

member.summary: Returns scenario execution status.

member.name: P:LightBDD.Core.Results.IScenarioResult.StatusDetails
member.summary: Returns status details. It will contain details for all bypassed, ignored or failed steps. It may be null if no additional details are provided.

member.name: P:LightBDD.Core.Results.IScenarioResult.ExecutionTime
member.summary: Returns scenario execution time.

member.name: M:LightBDD.Core.Results.IScenarioResult.GetSteps
member.summary: Returns results of steps executed within this scenario.

member.summary: Interface describing step test result.

member.summary: Returns step details.

member.name: P:LightBDD.Core.Results.IStepResult.Status
member.summary: Returns step execution status.

member.name: P:LightBDD.Core.Results.IStepResult.StatusDetails
member.summary: Returns status details that contains reason for bypassed, ignored or failed steps. It may be null if no additional details are provided.

member.name: P:LightBDD.Core.Results.IStepResult.ExecutionTime
member.summary: Returns step execution time.

member.name: P:LightBDD.Core.Results.IStepResult.Comments
member.summary: Returns step comments or empty collection if no comments were made.
